page.title: 09EAST ALLINGTON.SCHOOL DAY.
page.content: I get up at 7.00.Wash get changed and brush my hair.I then have breakfast. At 7.15 I watch television.At 8.00 I start walking to my bus stop at Coles Cross.When I get to school it is about half past eight. At 9.00 we start work.On monday we have Mrs Maddock who teaches us history, RE or needle work and sometimes does assembly.Every other day we have Mrs Boardman the headmisstress.We do assignments which consist of Maths,English,Sience,Art, and project.In the summer we try to fit in the morning as much work as we can so we can go swimming.In the winter term action van helps us with our games once per week.The first playtime is at 11.15 .We have dinner at 12.00.The price of dinners are Â£2.85 per week. Our last play is at quarter to three.At 3.15 we go home on the bus.
